excerpt: Streaming options for Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers: Watch the NFL clash live on NFL+, Hulu, FuboTV, FOX Sports, and SlingTV.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The 2024 NFL season has already produced many sensational matchups, and fans are eager to stream Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers in what promises to be another thrilling fixture. Five match weeks have concluded, and the final NFL table is beginning to take shape. One of the most exciting clashes lined up for the sixth week is the upcoming match between the Arizona Cardinals and the Green Bay Packers. Check out below how to watch the upcoming fixture between the Cardinals and the Packers on live streaming and TV. Where can you watch the Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers game today? You can watch Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers today via NFL+, Hulu, FuboTV, FOX Sports, and SlingTV. NFL+ is the go-to destination for football fans to catch all the league games live on stream. Other digital options include Hulu, SlingTV, and FuboTV. Meanwhile, fans who wish to catch the game on television can do so by tuning into FOX Sports. What time does the game start? Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers kicks off at 1 PM ET and 10 AM PT on October 13. The Packers have had a mixed start to their 2024 season, winning three of their five NFL fixtures so far. As such, they currently occupy the bottom position of the NFC North division. Meanwhile, the Cardinals have recorded worse numbers in their five matches, winning only two games. Both teams will be looking to get their campaigns back on track with a victory in this forthcoming match-up. How to watch & stream Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers for free? You can watch Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers for free via FuboTV, NFL+, and Hulu. FuboTV and NFL+ allow new users to experience a 7-day free trial before switching to their normal subscription plans. Meanwhile, Hulu extends a similar offer, with an introductory period that spans 30 days. Predictions While both teams have struggled in multiple areas this season, the Packers have showcased glaring issues in their defense. The Cardinals have also played inconsistently, delivering average performances on all fronts. Nonetheless, Green Bay’s defensive concerns could give Arizona an opening to clinch the game.
html:
The 2024 NFL season has already produced many sensational matchups, and fans are eager to stream Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers in what promises to be another thrilling fixture. Five match weeks have concluded, and the final NFL table is beginning to take shape. One of the most exciting clashes lined up for the sixth week is the upcoming match between the Arizona Cardinals and the Green Bay Packers.

Check out below how to watch the upcoming fixture between the Cardinals and the Packers on live streaming and TV.

Where can you watch the Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers game today?

You can watch Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers today via NFL+, Hulu, FuboTV, FOX Sports, and SlingTV.

NFL+ is the go-to destination for football fans to catch all the league games live on stream. Other digital options include Hulu, SlingTV, and FuboTV. Meanwhile, fans who wish to catch the game on television can do so by tuning into FOX Sports.

What time does the game start?

Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers kicks off at 1 PM ET and 10 AM PT on October 13.

The Packers have had a mixed start to their 2024 season, winning three of their five NFL fixtures so far. As such, they currently occupy the bottom position of the NFC North division. Meanwhile, the Cardinals have recorded worse numbers in their five matches, winning only two games. Both teams will be looking to get their campaigns back on track with a victory in this forthcoming match-up.

How to watch & stream Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers for free?

You can watch Arizona Cardinals vs Green Bay Packers for free via FuboTV, NFL+, and Hulu.

FuboTV and NFL+ allow new users to experience a 7-day free trial before switching to their normal subscription plans. Meanwhile, Hulu extends a similar offer, with an introductory period that spans 30 days.

Predictions

While both teams have struggled in multiple areas this season, the Packers have showcased glaring issues in their defense. The Cardinals have also played inconsistently, delivering average performances on all fronts. Nonetheless, Green Bay’s defensive concerns could give Arizona an opening to clinch the game.
